long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This script runs on the first day of every month and sends you an email with all the desired statistics on your own email behaviour.
Hourly and weekly volume, top senders and recipients, thread length, average response time... You will get a report with all the data you need about your email usage.
